## Matrix.toggleProjectionMatrixHandInPlace() method

Toggles projection matrix from being right handed to left handed in place and vice versa

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toggleProjectionMatrixHandInPlace(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
